header.title: Share On
header.description:
With Share On MOD, users can share the topics(the buttons are displayed only in the first post of each topic) in the following social networks: - Facebook - Twitter - Digg - MySpace - Orkut - Delicious - Technorati - Tuenti - Sonico - Friendfeed - Tumblr
For Google Plus[ADD-ON], visit: http://goo.gl/ajHWY
You can follow the development through the repository: http://goo.gl/zGvsP
** FEATURES ** - ACP module to manage the MOD. - Each button can be enabled/disabled individually. - Check version: displays when a new version is available.
header.author-notes: If you want to contribute to the development of this MOD, consider making a donation visiting: http://goo.gl/erGPa

action-group.diy-instructions:
IMPORTANT! Once you modify and upload all the files :
#####################################################################
A) Add the new MOD to your ACP
A.1) Run the install.php
#####################################################################
B) Purge the cache :
B.1) Navigate to "GENERAL" Tab. B.2) Next to "Purge the cache" click on "Run now". B.3) in the next screen, click on "Yes".
#####################################################################
C) Purge the templates and themes:
C.1) Navigate to "STYLES" Tab. C.2) Under "Style components " click on "Templates". C.3) Under "Actions" click on "Refresh". C.4) in the next screen, click on "Yes" ( Repeat last 2 steps with Themes and templates ).
#####################################################################
D) Enjoy :D
